description: As influence becomes a pillar of growth, personal branding has become necessary for everyone. The instructor of the course, Sophia comes with decades of branding & PR experience across leading brands. Find out how to build your personal brand in easy-to-follow steps.

Meant for those with a basic engineering background, the Master Python in 30 Days program teaches you to write clean Python code. After completion of this course, you will be able to automate tasks, build small apps, and understand core CS/DS concepts.

AI is not here to steal jobs. It is here to enhance your creativity and increase your productivity. Learn the basics of how to use AI, what are its most useful implementations and how to use it for personal growth.

Master AI to succeed at the workplace. Explore the tools that you will find useful. This course is job-role agnostic. So you are sure to find tools that will help you deliver results at the workplace better and faster.

This course teaches the strategies to build brand awareness, how to attract customers online and the key metrics that you can focus on. It includes tactics for website development, SEO, social media, direct communication & ad management.
This is a comprehensive course for beginners. Learn the fundamentals of graphic design and create stunning visuals using industry-standard tools and techniques.
